p: Vo-STB had the best antibacterial effect among the investigated V. officinalis extracts. Vo-STB inhibited the growth of Gram-positive bacteria at MICs in the range of 0.6−2.2 mg /mL and Gram-negative at MICs in the range 0.6−4.5 mg/mL. In particular, strains of S. epidermidis, Y. enterocolitica and K. pneumoniae were more sensitive (MIC/MBC 0.6 mg/mL). Vo-STB also showed lower MBC values in relation to most strains compared Vo-in vivo, Vo-C and Vo-S.
